constraints.reason: Appears in changelog section :boom: Breaking Change

description:
## Release (2024-05-06)

shepherd-docs 0.0.2 (patch)
react-shepherd 5.0.0 (major)
shepherd.js 12.0.0 (patch)

#### :boom: Breaking Change
* `react-shepherd`
  * [#2707](https://github.com/shepherd-pro/shepherd/pull/2707) React: ‚ú® Adding improved provider for v5 release ([@chuckcarpenter](https://github.com/chuckcarpenter))

* `shepherd-docs`

* `shepherd-docs`, `shepherd.js`
